Title: These Are Crucial Decisions Every Leader Needs to Make
Description:
Today, we hear from:

•      A vice president who is trying to balance leading a large team while doing her own job

•      A solopreneur who needs help but doesn’t have time to hire anyone

•      An Instagram follower who is trying to decide when to hire a contractor on as a team member

•      A managing partner who is wondering if her work expectations are too high for millennials and Gen Zers

•      A caller who wants to know how her faith should influence her work
